description: This is an HTML source file for a web-based database visualization interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript code for dynamic data loading, user interactions, and UI updates.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the table list for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
